app.aggregatedDataReasoning: You are currently in the role of the city. Below you can see the aggregated data accessible to the city from the mobility context.

welcome.title: Welcome to our @:app.confidentiality-visualizer
welcome.get_help: Click on the Help button to get further information about our application.
welcome.getting_started: To begin, choose a role first by selecting one of the icons in the navigation bar.
welcome.click_to_see_data: Click on one of the vehicle icons on the map to see the collected data about the trip.

help.title: Help
help.about_the_app_text: This web-based demonstrator is used to help understand, what kind of data is selected, when using public vehicles like e-bikes and trains. It also shows, how critical those data are and who has access to them, by allowing to select different views from which the data can be seen.
help.how_it_works_text: To use the app, first you should press start to start the animation. Then you can click on different Icons to open the data viewer and see the data of the user of the selected vehicle from a chosen view. There are also explanations available, if xou click on the data type, and you can easily see, how critical the data ar, by looking at the color of the datatype.
help.what_infos_you_can_get_text: With this app, you can see, what types of data are selected when using public vehicles, to whom they are visible for what reason, how critical thea are and how long they are stored.
